::Shredder::

Shredder frowns, looking the two bots over. They needed new troops, that was 
a given, even if those troops were temporary, and, from his experience, bots 
that betrayed from other factions often betrayed again. He hears Mantella's 
voice behind him, but Facon answered before he could.

"Yeah, you can join," he replies to Falcon, "We're fixing the base right now, 
you can help."
